CB1.name: CB1
CB1.question: Is this request for the start of a new treatment for the patient?
CB1.context: Initial checkbox in treatment timeline section indicating whether patient is beginning new therapy.

T2.name: T2
T2.question: What is the two-digit month for the treatment start date?
T2.context: Month component for the planned medication initiation date in treatment scheduling section.

T3.name: T3
T3.question: What is the two-digit day for the treatment start date?
T3.context: Day component for the planned medication initiation date in treatment scheduling section.

T4.name: T4
T4.question: What is the four-digit year for the treatment start date?
T4.context: Year component for the planned medication initiation date in treatment scheduling section.

CB5.name: CB5
CB5.question: Is this request for the continuation of an existing therapy for the patient?
CB5.context: Checkbox indicating if the request is for ongoing treatment, as opposed to new initiation.

T6.name: T6
T6.question: What is the two-digit month of the patient's last treatment?
T6.context: Month component for the last treatment date, required for continuation of therapy requests.

T7.name: T7
T7.question: What is the two-digit day of the patient's last treatment?
T7.context: Day component for the last treatment date, required for continuation of therapy requests.

T8.name: T8
T8.question: What is the four-digit year of the patient's last treatment?
T8.context: Year component for the last treatment date, required for continuation of therapy requests.

T9.name: T9
T9.question: Who is submitting this precertification request?
T9.context: Identifies the individual or entity responsible for submitting the prior authorization request.

T10.name: T10
T10.question: What is the phone number of the person requesting precertification?
T10.context: Contact phone number for follow-up regarding the submitted precertification request.

T11.name: T11
T11.question: What is the fax number of the person requesting precertification?
T11.context: Contact fax number for sending or receiving precertification-related documents.

T12.name: T12
T12.question: What is the patient's first name?
T12.context: Patient demographic information for identification purposes in the clinical information section.

T13.name: T13
T13.question: What is the patient's last name?
T13.context: Patient demographic information for identification purposes in the clinical information section.

T14.name: T14
T14.question: What is the patient's date of birth?
T14.context: Patient demographic information for identification and age verification purposes.

T15.name: T15
T15.question: What is the patient's home address?
T15.context: Patient's residential street address for contact and demographic records.

T16.name: T16
T16.question: What is the patient's home city?
T16.context: Patient's city of residence, part of the complete home address.

T17.name: T17
T17.question: What is the patient's home state?
T17.context: Patient's state of residence, part of the complete home address.

T18.name: T18
T18.question: What is the patient's home ZIP code?
T18.context: Patient's ZIP code, completing the demographic home address details.

T19.name: T19
T19.question: What is the patient's phone number?
T19.context: Patient contact information for communication regarding the prior authorization request.

T20.name: T20
T20.question: What is the patient's work phone number?
T20.context: Patient's alternative work contact number, if applicable, for communication.

T21.name: T21
T21.question: What is the patient's cell phone number?
T21.context: Patient's mobile contact number, important for direct communication.

T22.name: T22
T22.question: What is the patient's email address?
T22.context: Patient's email address for electronic communication and record-keeping.

T24.name: T24
T24.question: What is the patient's current weight in pounds (lbs)?
T24.context: Patient's current weight in pounds, used for calculating medication dosage and clinical assessment.

T25.name: T25
T25.question: What is the patient's current weight in kilograms (kgs)?
T25.context: Patient's current weight in kilograms, alternative unit for medication dosage calculation.

T26.name: T26
T26.question: What is the patient's current height in inches?
T26.context: Patient's current height in inches, used for Body Surface Area (BSA) calculations.

T27.name: T27
T27.question: What is the patient's current height in centimeters (cms)?
T27.context: Patient's current height in centimeters, alternative unit for BSA calculations.

T23.name: T23
T23.question: What are the patient's known allergies?
T23.context: Lists all patient allergies, critical for medication safety and preventing adverse reactions.

T28.name: T28
T28.question: What is the patient's insurance member ID number?
T28.context: Patient's unique insurance identification number for eligibility and benefits verification.

T29.name: T29
T29.question: What is the patient's insurance group number?
T29.context: Patient's insurance group number, identifying their specific plan or employer group.

T30.name: T30
T30.question: Who is the primary insured party on the patient's policy?
T30.context: Name of the primary policyholder if different from the patient, for insurance verification.

CB31.name: CB31
CB31.question: Does the patient have other insurance coverage?
CB31.context: Indicates if the patient has additional primary or secondary health insurance coverage.

CB32.name: CB32
CB32.question: Does the patient not have other insurance coverage?
CB32.context: Indicates if the patient solely relies on this insurance, without other coverage.

T33.name: T33
T33.question: If yes, what is the ID number for the patient's other coverage?
T33.context: Requires the ID number for any additional insurance coverage the patient may have.

T34.name: T34
T34.question: What is the carrier name of the patient's other insurance?
T34.context: Name of the insurance company providing the patient's other health coverage.

T35.name: T35
T35.question: Who is the primary insured party on the patient's other policy?
T35.context: Name of the primary policyholder for the patient's other insurance coverage.

T42.name: T42
T42.question: What is the prescriber's first name?
T42.context: Prescriber's first name for identification and verification in the Prescriber Information section.

T43.name: T43
T43.question: What is the prescriber's last name?
T43.context: Prescriber's last name for identification and verification in the Prescriber Information section.

CB44.name: CB44
CB44.question: Is the prescriber an M.D. (Medical Doctor)?
CB44.context: Prescriber's professional credential (Medical Doctor) for licensing and qualification verification.

CB45.name: CB45
CB45.question: Is the prescriber a D.O. (Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine)?
CB45.context: Prescriber's professional credential (Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine) for licensing verification.

CB46.name: CB46
CB46.question: Is the prescriber an N.P. (Nurse Practitioner)?
CB46.context: Prescriber's professional credential (Nurse Practitioner) for licensing and qualification verification.

CB47.name: CB47
CB47.question: Is the prescriber a P.A. (Physician Assistant)?
CB47.context: Prescriber's professional credential (Physician Assistant) for licensing and qualification verification.

T48.name: T48
T48.question: What is the prescriber's office address?
T48.context: Prescriber's primary office street address for contact and record-keeping.

T49.name: T49
T49.question: What is the city of the prescriber's office?
T49.context: City of the prescriber's office, part of the complete office address.

T50.name: T50
T50.question: What is the state of the prescriber's office?
T50.context: State of the prescriber's office, part of the complete office address.

T51.name: T51
T51.question: What is the ZIP code of the prescriber's office?
T51.context: ZIP code of the prescriber's office, completing the office address details.

T52.name: T52
T52.question: What is the prescriber's office phone number?
T52.context: Prescriber's primary office contact number for direct communication.

T53.name: T53
T53.question: What is the prescriber's office fax number?
T53.context: Prescriber's office fax number for sending or receiving medical documentation.

T54.name: T54
T54.question: What is the prescriber's state license number?
T54.context: Prescriber's state medical license number, essential for verification of credentials.

T55.name: T55
T55.question: What is the prescriber's NPI (National Provider Identifier) number?
T55.context: Prescriber's unique NPI for standardized identification in healthcare transactions.

T56.name: T56
T56.question: What is the prescriber's DEA (Drug Enforcement Administration) number?
T56.context: Prescriber's DEA registration number, required for prescribing controlled substances.

T57.name: T57
T57.question: What is the prescriber's UPIN (Unique Physician Identification Number)?
T57.context: Prescriber's UPIN, if applicable, for physician identification (legacy identifier).

T58.0.name: T58.0
T58.0.question: What is the prescriber's email address?
T58.0.context: Prescriber's email address for electronic communication regarding patient care.

T58.1.name: T58.1
T58.1.question: What is the name of the primary contact person at the prescriber's office?
T58.1.context: Name of a key administrative contact at the prescriber's office for PA inquiries.

T59.name: T59
T59.question: What is the phone number for the prescriber's office contact?
T59.context: Direct phone number for the specified office contact person, if different from main office.

Provider Admin CB.1.name: Provider Admin CB.1
Provider Admin CB.1.question: Is the medication self-administered by the patient?
Provider Admin CB.1.context: Indicates if the patient takes the medication independently, affecting dispensing location.

Provider Admin CB.2.name: Provider Admin CB.2
Provider Admin CB.2.question: Will the medication be administered in the physician's office?
Provider Admin CB.2.context: Indicates the medication will be administered at the prescriber's office, common for infused drugs.

Provider Admin CB.3.name: Provider Admin CB.3
Provider Admin CB.3.question: Will the medication be administered at the patient's home?
Provider Admin CB.3.context: Indicates if the patient will receive the medication at home, common for home health services.

Provider Admin CB.4.name: Provider Admin CB.4
Provider Admin CB.4.question: Will the medication be administered at an outpatient infusion center?
Provider Admin CB.4.context: Indicates administration at a dedicated outpatient infusion facility.

Provider Admin T.5.name: Provider Admin T.5
Provider Admin T.5.question: What is the name of the outpatient infusion center?
Provider Admin T.5.context: Name of the specific outpatient infusion center where medication will be administered.

Provider Admin CB.7.name: Provider Admin CB.7
Provider Admin CB.7.question: Will the medication be administered by a home infusion center?
Provider Admin CB.7.context: Indicates if a specialized home infusion service will administer the medication at home.

Provider Admin T.6.name: Provider Admin T.6
Provider Admin T.6.question: What is the phone number of the home infusion center?
Provider Admin T.6.context: Phone number of the home infusion center for scheduling and coordination.

Provider Admin T.8.name: Provider Admin T.8
Provider Admin T.8.question: What is the name of the home infusion agency?
Provider Admin T.8.context: Name of the home infusion agency providing services, if applicable.

Provider Admin CB.10.name: Provider Admin CB.10
Provider Admin CB.10.question: Are administration code(s) being provided for this request?
Provider Admin CB.10.context: Checkbox to indicate if relevant CPT administration codes will be included for the service.

Provider Admin T.9.name: Provider Admin T.9
Provider Admin T.9.question: What are the CPT administration code(s) for this service?
Provider Admin T.9.context: Specific CPT codes for the medication's administration, vital for billing and service description.

Provider Admin T.11A.name: Provider Admin T.11A
Provider Admin T.11A.question: What is the address for the dispensing provider/administration location?
Provider Admin T.11A.context: Street address of the dispensing provider or administration facility.

Provider Admin T.13.name: Provider Admin T.13
Provider Admin T.13.question: What is the city for the dispensing provider/administration location?
Provider Admin T.13.context: City of the dispensing provider or administration facility.

Provider Admin T.14.name: Provider Admin T.14
Provider Admin T.14.question: What is the state for the dispensing provider/administration location?
Provider Admin T.14.context: State of the dispensing provider or administration facility.

Provider Admin T.15.name: Provider Admin T.15

Provider Admin T.16.name: Provider Admin T.16

Provider Admin T.17A.name: Provider Admin T.17A

Provider Admin T.17A.context: Fax number for the dispensing provider or administration facility for document transmission.

Provider Admin T.18.name: Provider Admin T.18
Provider Admin T.18.question: What is the Tax Identification Number (TIN) for the dispensing provider/administration location?
Provider Admin T.18.context: TIN of the dispensing provider or administration facility, used for tax and billing purposes.

Provider Admin T.19.name: Provider Admin T.19
Provider Admin T.19.question: What is the Provider Identification Number (PIN) for the dispensing provider/administration location?
Provider Admin T.19.context: PIN of the dispensing provider or administration facility for unique identification.

Provider Admin T.20.name: Provider Admin T.20
Provider Admin T.20.question: What is the NPI (National Provider Identifier) for the dispensing provider/administration location?
Provider Admin T.20.context: NPI of the dispensing provider or administration facility for standardized identification.

Provider Admin CB.21.name: Provider Admin CB.21
Provider Admin CB.21.question: Will the medication be dispensed/administered at an outpatient dialysis center?
Provider Admin CB.21.context: Checkbox indicating if the medication will be provided by an outpatient dialysis center.

Provider Admin CB.22.name: Provider Admin CB.22
Provider Admin CB.22.question: Will the medication be dispensed/administered at a physician's office?
Provider Admin CB.22.context: Checkbox indicating if the medication will be provided by a physician's office.

Provider Admin CB.23.0.0.name: Provider Admin CB.23.0.0

Provider Admin CB.24.0.0.context: Checkbox indicating if the medication will be obtained from a specialty pharmacy.

Provider Admin CB.25.name: Provider Admin CB.25
Provider Admin CB.25.question: Will the medication be dispensed by mail order?
Provider Admin CB.25.context: Checkbox indicating if the medication will be delivered via mail order pharmacy services.

Provider Admin CB.26.name: Provider Admin CB.26
Provider Admin CB.26.question: Will the medication be dispensed/administered by another type of facility not listed?
Provider Admin CB.26.context: Option to specify an alternative dispensing or administration location not pre-listed.

Provider Admin T.27.name: Provider Admin T.27
Provider Admin T.27.question: Please specify the 'Other' dispensing/administration location.

Provider Admin T.28.name: Provider Admin T.28

Provider Admin T.29a.name: Provider Admin T.29a

Provider Admin T.30a.context: City of the dispensing provider or pharmacy.

Provider Admin T.31.name: Provider Admin T.31
Provider Admin T.31.question: What is the state of the dispensing provider/pharmacy?
Provider Admin T.31.context: State of the dispensing provider or pharmacy.

Provider Admin T.32.name: Provider Admin T.32
Provider Admin T.32.question: What is the ZIP code of the dispensing provider/pharmacy?
Provider Admin T.32.context: ZIP code of the dispensing provider or pharmacy.

Provider Admin T.33.name: Provider Admin T.33
Provider Admin T.33.question: What is the phone number for the dispensing provider/pharmacy?

Provider Admin T.34.name: Provider Admin T.34

CB60.name: CB60
CB60.question: Is the requested product Riabni (rituximab-arrx)?
CB60.context: Selection for Riabni, a non-preferred rituximab biosimilar, in the Product Information section.

CB61.name: CB61
CB61.question: Is the requested product Rituxan (rituximab)?
CB61.context: Selection for Rituxan, a non-preferred rituximab product, in the Product Information section.

CB62.name: CB62
CB62.question: Is the requested product Ruxience (rituximab-pvvr)?
CB62.context: Selection for Ruxience, a preferred rituximab biosimilar, in the Product Information section.

CB63.name: CB63
CB63.question: Is the requested product Truxima (rituximab-abbs)?
CB63.context: Selection for Truxima, a preferred rituximab biosimilar, in the Product Information section.

T64.name: T64
T64.question: What is the prescribed dose of the requested medication?
T64.context: Prescribed dosage of the medication, essential for clinical review and safety.

T65.name: T65
T65.question: What are the directions for use of the requested medication?
T65.context: Instructions for medication administration, including frequency and route, for clinical assessment.

T66.name: T66
T66.question: What is the HCPCS code for the requested medication or service?
T66.context: HCPCS code identifying the specific drug or service for billing and coverage determination.

T67.name: T67
T67.question: What is the primary ICD code for the patient's diagnosis?
T67.context: Primary International Classification of Diseases (ICD) code describing the patient's main diagnosis.

CB68.name: CB68
CB68.question: Are there other ICD codes applicable to the patient's diagnosis?
CB68.context: Checkbox indicating if additional ICD codes will be provided for other relevant diagnoses.

T69.name: T69
T69.question: What are the other applicable ICD codes?
T69.context: Lists additional ICD codes for co-morbidities or secondary diagnoses, if applicable.

CB70.name: CB70
CB70.question: Has the patient received prior therapy with the requested product within the last 365 days?
CB70.context: Indicates if the patient has recent experience with the specific medication being requested.

CB71.name: CB71
CB71.question: Has the patient not received prior therapy with the requested product within the last 365 days?
CB71.context: Indicates if the patient has no recent history of therapy with the requested medication.

CB72.name: CB72
CB72.question: Has the patient NOT had a trial and failure of any rituximab biosimilars listed?
CB72.context: Indicates if the patient has not failed preferred rituximab biosimilars, influencing product selection.

CB73.name: CB73
CB73.question: Has the patient had a trial and failure of Ruxience (rituximab-pvvr)?
CB73.context: Indicates if the patient has failed a trial of the preferred rituximab biosimilar Ruxience.

CB74.name: CB74
CB74.question: Has the patient had a trial and failure of Truxima (rituximab-abbs)?
CB74.context: Indicates if the patient has failed a trial of the preferred rituximab biosimilar Truxima.

T75.name: T75
T75.field_label: When was the member’s trial and failure of the preferred drug?
T75.question: When did the patient's trial and failure of the preferred drug occur?
T75.context: Date of documented trial failure of preferred biosimilars, supporting the current request.

T76.name: T76
T76.field_label: Please describe the nature of the failure of the preferred drug
T76.question: What was the nature of the patient's failure with the preferred drug?
T76.context: Detailed explanation of why the preferred medication failed, for medical necessity review.

CB77.name: CB77
CB77.question: Has the patient NOT had an adverse reaction to any rituximab biosimilars listed?
CB77.context: Indicates if the patient has not experienced adverse reactions to preferred rituximab biosimilars.

CB78.name: CB78
CB78.question: Has the patient had an adverse reaction to Ruxience (rituximab-pvvr)?
CB78.context: Indicates if the patient experienced an adverse reaction to the preferred biosimilar Ruxience.

CB79.name: CB79
CB79.question: Has the patient had an adverse reaction to Truxima (rituximab-abbs)?
CB79.context: Indicates if the patient experienced an adverse reaction to the preferred biosimilar Truxima.

T80.name: T80
T80.field_label: When was the member’s adverse reaction to the preferred drug?
T80.question: When did the patient's adverse reaction to the preferred drug occur?
T80.context: Date of documented adverse reaction to preferred biosimilars, supporting current request.

T81.name: T81
T81.field_label: Please describe the nature of the adverse reaction to the preferred drug
T81.question: What was the nature of the patient's adverse reaction to the preferred drug?
T81.context: Detailed explanation of the adverse reaction to the preferred medication, for medical necessity.

T84.name: T84
T84.field_label: Please explain if there are any contraindications or other medical reason(s) that the patient cannot use any of the following preferred biosimilar products when indicated for the patient’s diagnosis?
T84.question: Please explain any contraindications or medical reasons preventing the patient from using preferred rituximab biosimilars.
T84.context: Requires a clinical justification for not using preferred biosimilar rituximab options, if applicable.

CB82.name: CB82
CB82.question: Is Ruxience (rituximab-pvvr) contraindicated or medically unsuitable for the patient's diagnosis?
CB82.context: Indicates a contraindication or medical reason preventing the use of Ruxience for the patient.

CB83.name: CB83
CB83.question: Is Truxima (rituximab-abbs) contraindicated or medically unsuitable for the patient's diagnosis?
CB83.context: Indicates a contraindication or medical reason preventing the use of Truxima for the patient.

CB86.name: CB86
CB86.question: Has the patient had a trial and failure of Inflectra (infliximab-dyyb)?
CB86.context: Indicates if Inflectra, a preferred biosimilar, was tried and failed as prior therapy.

CB87.name: CB87
CB87.question: Has the patient had a trial and failure of Renflexis (infliximab-abda)?
CB87.context: Indicates if Renflexis, a preferred biosimilar, was tried and failed as prior therapy.

CB88.name: CB88
CB88.question: Has the patient had a trial and failure of Simponi Aria (golimumab)?
CB88.context: Indicates if Simponi Aria, a preferred biologic, was tried and failed as prior therapy.

T89.name: T89
T89.field_label: When was the member’s trial and failure of the preferred drug?
T89.question: When did the patient experience trial and failure of the preferred drug?
T89.context: Date of trial and failure for the previously selected preferred biosimilar or biologic.

T90.name: T90
T90.field_label: Please describe the nature of the failure of the preferred drug
T90.question: Please describe how the preferred drug trial failed.
T90.context: Detailed explanation of clinical reasons for failure of prior preferred therapy.

CB85.name: CB85
CB85.question: Has the patient NOT had a trial and failure of Inflectra, Renflexis, or Simponi Aria?
CB85.context: Indicates no prior trial and failure of listed preferred therapies for patient. Dependent on parent question.

CB92.name: CB92
CB92.question: Has the patient had an adverse reaction to Inflectra (infliximab-dyyb)?
CB92.context: Indicates if Inflectra, a preferred biosimilar, caused an adverse reaction for patient.

CB93.name: CB93

CB93.context: Indicates if Renflexis, a preferred biosimilar, caused an adverse reaction for patient.

CB94.name: CB94

CB94.context: Indicates if Simponi Aria, a preferred biologic, caused an adverse reaction for patient.

T96a.name: T96a

CB91.name: CB91
CB91.question: Has the patient NOT had an adverse reaction to Inflectra, Renflexis, or Simponi Aria?
